speaker: user
message: hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1, i have a question regarding citation

speaker: user
message: if i have 2 back to back sentence in a paragraph coming from the same source, do i have to cite the source twice?

speaker: user
message: hmm okay i will work my way around that!

speaker: user
message: i have another question regarding databases

speaker: user
message: do we have any database that talks more about companies financial performance or macroeconomic conditions?

speaker: user
message: okie i will take a look!

speaker: helpdesk
message: This is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1. How may I help?

speaker: helpdesk
message: If it is clear that you are referring to the same source, you do not need to cite twice

speaker: helpdesk
message: This cheatsheet may be useful to you

speaker: helpdesk
message: EMIS, Orbis are databases that have company financial information
